# Backlog Entry Template

> Use this structure inside `docs/project/backlog.md` to capture upcoming items before they enter active development.

## Feature / Initiatives Title

- **Created by:** Name or agent ID
- **Date:** YYYY-MM-DD
- **Type:** New feature ▢ / Enhancement ▢ / Bug fix ▢ / Research ▢
- **Status:** Proposed ▢ / Ready for design ▢ / Ready for build ▢

### Problem / Opportunity

- Brief description of the user need or technical gap.
- Impacted personas or systems.

### Desired Outcome

- Success criteria or acceptance tests.
- Metrics or signals that will confirm it worked.

### Discovery Notes

- Links to designs, specs, TBD entries, research, or related issues.
- Known constraints or blockers.

### Next Steps

- Actions to move this into `working-roadmap.md`.
- Owner responsible for the next action.
